languages.text: Лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два передает Вольному Торговцу в пользование особый боевой снаряд, освященный по всем канонам Машинного культа, и надеется на дальнейшее сотрудничество.

traits.locale_text: Лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два передает вам в пользование особый боевой снаряд и надеется на дальнейшее сотрудничество.

languages.text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.
languages.original_text: Лексмеханик Порядковый Номер Сорок Два передает Вольному Торговцу в пользование особый боевой снаряд, освященный по всем канонам Машинного культа, и надеется на дальнейшее сотрудничество.

traits.locale_text: Lexmechanic Service Number Forty-Two hands you over a special missile that's been blessed in full accordance with the Machine Cult canon. He hopes for further cooperation.

Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents you with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

languages.text: 思律机僧42号服务单元赠送给行商浪人一枚特制导弹，这枚导弹按照机械修会的制度进行了彻底的祝福。思律机僧表示希望今后双方可以继续合作。
languages.original_text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: 思律机僧42号服务单元赠送给行商浪人一枚特制导弹，这枚导弹按照机械修会的制度进行了彻底的祝福。思律机僧表示希望今后双方可以继续合作。

languages.text: El lexmecánico Unidad de Servicio 42 hace entrega a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de un misil especial, bendito según la liturgia del Culto Máquina, y confía en que puedan volver a cooperar en el futuro.
languages.original_text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: El lexmecánico Unidad de Servicio 42 te hace entrega de un misil especial, bendito según la liturgia del Culto Máquina, y confía en que podáis volver a cooperar en el futuro.

languages.text: 法技術者サービスユニット42は、ローグトレーダーに機械教団の全典礼に則った特別なミサイルを授け、今後の協力への希望を表明する。
languages.original_text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: 法技術者サービスユニット42は、機械教団の全典礼に則った特別なミサイルを授け、今後の協力への希望を表明する。

languages.text: Lexmechanicus Diensteinheit 42 präsentiert {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} eine spezielle Rakete, die gemäß der Liturgie des Maschinenkults gesegnet wurde, und verleiht seiner Hoffnung auf eine zukünftige Kooperation Ausdruck.
languages.original_text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Lexmechanicus Diensteinheit 42 präsentiert {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} eine spezielle Rakete, die gemäß der Liturgie des Maschinenkults gesegnet wurde, und verleiht seiner Hoffnung auf eine zukünftige Kooperation Ausdruck.
Lexmechanicus Diensteinheit 42 präsentiert dir eine spezielle Rakete, die gemäß der Liturgie des Maschinenkults gesegnet wurde, und verleiht seiner Hoffnung auf eine zukünftige Kooperation Ausdruck.

languages.text: L'unité de service lexmécanicienne 42 présente {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} un missile spécial qui a été béni selon les principes les plus stricts de la liturgie du culte de la machine et espère pouvoir bientôt traiter avec vous à nouveau.
languages.original_text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.

traits.locale_text: L'unité de service lexmécanicienne 42 présente {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} un missile spécial qui a été béni selon les principes les plus stricts de la liturgie du culte de la machine et espère pouvoir bientôt traiter avec vous à nouveau.

languages.text: Lexmekanik Hizmet Birimi 42, Hür Tacir'e Makine Tarikatı ayinlerine tamamen uygun şekilde kutsanmış özel bir füze sunuyor ve gelecekteki olası iş birliği için umutlarını dile getiriyor.
languages.original_text: Lexmechanic Service Unit 42 presents the Rogue Trader with a special missile that has been blessed in full accordance with Machine Cult liturgy and expresses his hope for future cooperation.
